00009 template<class T, unsigned int n>
00010 void x_write(vcl_ostream & os, vnl_vector_fixed<T,n> const& v, vcl_string name)
00011 {
00012   vsl_basic_xml_element element(name);
00013   element.add_attribute("size", (int) n);
00014   for (unsigned i=0; i<n; i++)
00015     element.append_cdata(v.get(i));
00016   element.x_write(os);
00017 }

00020 template<class T, unsigned int n>
00021 void x_write_tree(vcl_ostream & os, vnl_vector_fixed<T,n> const& v, vcl_string name)
00022 {
00023   vsl_basic_xml_element element(name);
00024   element.add_attribute("size", (int) n);
00025   for (unsigned i=0; i<n; i++) {
00026     element.append_cdata("<element>");
00027     element.append_cdata(v.get(i));
00028     element.append_cdata("</element>");
00029   }
00030   element.x_write(os);
00031 }
